Member Function Documentation

◆ _render_calibration_thumbnail_framebuffer()

void Slic3r::GUI::GCodeViewer::_render_calibration_thumbnail_framebuffer ( ThumbnailData &  thumbnail_data,
unsigned int  w,
unsigned int  h,
const ThumbnailsParams &  thumbnail_params,
PartPlateList &  partplate_list,
OpenGLManager &  opengl_manager 
)
1532{
1533 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) << boost::format("render_calibration_thumbnail prepare: width %1%, height %2%")%w %h;
1534 thumbnail_data.set(w, h);
1535 if (!thumbnail_data.is_valid())
1536 return;
1537
1538 //TODO bool multisample = m_multisample_allowed;
1539 bool multisample = OpenGLManager::can_multisample();
1540 //if (!multisample)
1541 // glsafe(::glEnable(GL_MULTISAMPLE));
1542
1543 GLint max_samples;
1544 glsafe(::glGetIntegerv(GL_MAX_SAMPLES, &max_samples));
1545 GLsizei num_samples = max_samples / 2;
1546
1547 GLuint render_fbo;
1548 glsafe(::glGenFramebuffers(1, &render_fbo));
1549 glsafe(::glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, render_fbo));
1550 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) << boost::format("render_calibration_thumbnail prepare: max_samples %1%, multisample %2%, render_fbo %3%")%max_samples %multisample %render_fbo;
1551
1552 GLuint render_tex = 0;
1553 GLuint render_tex_buffer = 0;
1554 if (multisample) {
1555 // use renderbuffer instead of texture to avoid the need to use glTexImage2DMultisample which is available only since OpenGL 3.2
1556 glsafe(::glGenRenderbuffers(1, &render_tex_buffer));
1557 glsafe(::glBindRenderbuffer(GL_RENDERBUFFER, render_tex_buffer));
1558 glsafe(::glRenderbufferStorageMultisample(GL_RENDERBUFFER, num_samples, GL_RGBA8, w, h));
1559 glsafe(::glFramebufferRenderbuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, GL_RENDERBUFFER, render_tex_buffer));
1560 }
1561 else {
1562 glsafe(::glGenTextures(1, &render_tex));
1563 glsafe(::glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, render_tex));
1564 glsafe(::glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA8, w, h, 0, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, nullptr));
1565 glsafe(::glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR));
1566 glsafe(::glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR));
1567 glsafe(::glFramebufferTexture2D(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, GL_TEXTURE_2D, render_tex, 0));
1568 }
1569
1570 GLuint render_depth;
1571 glsafe(::glGenRenderbuffers(1, &render_depth));
1572 glsafe(::glBindRenderbuffer(GL_RENDERBUFFER, render_depth));
1573 if (multisample)
1574 glsafe(::glRenderbufferStorageMultisample(GL_RENDERBUFFER, num_samples, GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT24, w, h));
1575 else
1576 glsafe(::glRenderbufferStorage(GL_RENDERBUFFER, GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT, w, h));
1577
1578 glsafe(::glFramebufferRenderbuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_DEPTH_ATTACHMENT, GL_RENDERBUFFER, render_depth));
1579
1580 GLenum drawBufs[] = { GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0 };
1581 glsafe(::glDrawBuffers(1, drawBufs));
1582
1583
1584 if (::glCheckFramebufferStatus(GL_FRAMEBUFFER) == GL_FRAMEBUFFER_COMPLETE) {
1585 _render_calibration_thumbnail_internal(thumbnail_data, thumbnail_params, partplate_list, opengl_manager);
1586
1587 if (multisample) {
1588 GLuint resolve_fbo;
1589 glsafe(::glGenFramebuffers(1, &resolve_fbo));
1590 glsafe(::glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, resolve_fbo));
1591
1592 GLuint resolve_tex;
1593 glsafe(::glGenTextures(1, &resolve_tex));
1594 glsafe(::glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, resolve_tex));
1595 glsafe(::glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA8, w, h, 0, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, nullptr));
1596 glsafe(::glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR));
1597 glsafe(::glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR));
1598 glsafe(::glFramebufferTexture2D(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, GL_TEXTURE_2D, resolve_tex, 0));
1599
1600 glsafe(::glDrawBuffers(1, drawBufs));
1601
1602 if (::glCheckFramebufferStatus(GL_FRAMEBUFFER) == GL_FRAMEBUFFER_COMPLETE) {
1603 glsafe(::glBindFramebuffer(GL_READ_FRAMEBUFFER, render_fbo));
1604 glsafe(::glBindFramebuffer(GL_DRAW_FRAMEBUFFER, resolve_fbo));
1605 glsafe(::glBlitFramebuffer(0, 0, w, h, 0, 0, w, h, GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT, GL_LINEAR));
1606
1607 glsafe(::glBindFramebuffer(GL_READ_FRAMEBUFFER, resolve_fbo));
1608 glsafe(::glReadPixels(0, 0, w, h, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, (void*)thumbnail_data.pixels.data()));
1609 }
1610
1611 glsafe(::glDeleteTextures(1, &resolve_tex));
1612 glsafe(::glDeleteFramebuffers(1, &resolve_fbo));
1613 }
1614 else
1615 glsafe(::glReadPixels(0, 0, w, h, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, (void*)thumbnail_data.pixels.data()));
1616 }
1617#if ENABLE_CALIBRATION_THUMBNAIL_OUTPUT
1618 debug_calibration_output_thumbnail(thumbnail_data);
1619#endif
1620
1621 glsafe(::glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, 0));
1622 glsafe(::glDeleteRenderbuffers(1, &render_depth));
1623 if (render_tex_buffer != 0)
1624 glsafe(::glDeleteRenderbuffers(1, &render_tex_buffer));
1625 if (render_tex != 0)
1626 glsafe(::glDeleteTextures(1, &render_tex));
1627 glsafe(::glDeleteFramebuffers(1, &render_fbo));
1628
1629 //if (!multisample)
1630 // glsafe(::glDisable(GL_MULTISAMPLE));
1631 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) << boost::format("render_calibration_thumbnail prepare: exit");
1632}
glsafe
#define glsafe(cmd)

void Slic3r::GUI::GCodeViewer::_render_calibration_thumbnail_internal ( ThumbnailData &  thumbnail_data,
const ThumbnailsParams &  thumbnail_params,
PartPlateList &  partplate_list,
OpenGLManager &  opengl_manager 
)
1333{
1334 int plate_idx = thumbnail_params.plate_id;
1335 PartPlate* plate = partplate_list.get_plate(plate_idx);
1336 BoundingBoxf3 plate_box = plate->get_bounding_box(false);
1337 plate_box.min.z() = 0.0;
1338 plate_box.max.z() = 0.0;
1339 Vec3d center = plate_box.center();
1340
1341#if 1
1342 Camera camera;
1343 camera.apply_viewport(0,0,thumbnail_data.width, thumbnail_data.height);
1344 camera.set_scene_box(plate_box);
1345 camera.set_type(Camera::EType::Ortho);
1346 camera.set_target(center);
1347 camera.select_view("top");
1348 camera.apply_view_matrix();
1349 camera.zoom_to_box(plate_box, 1.0f);
1350 camera.apply_projection(plate_box);
1351
1352 auto render_as_triangles = [
1353#if ENABLE_GCODE_VIEWER_STATISTICS
1354 this
1355#endif // ENABLE_GCODE_VIEWER_STATISTICS
1356 ](TBuffer &buffer, std::vector<RenderPath>::iterator it_path, std::vector<RenderPath>::iterator it_end, GLShaderProgram& shader, int uniform_color) {
1357 for (auto it = it_path; it != it_end && it_path->ibuffer_id == it->ibuffer_id; ++it) {
1358 const RenderPath& path = *it;
1359 // Some OpenGL drivers crash on empty glMultiDrawElements, see GH #7415.
1360 assert(!path.sizes.empty());
1361 assert(!path.offsets.empty());
1362 glsafe(::glUniform4fv(uniform_color, 1, static_cast<const GLfloat*>(path.color.data())));
1363 glsafe(::glMultiDrawElements(GL_TRIANGLES, (const GLsizei*)path.sizes.data(), GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT, (const void* const*)path.offsets.data(), (GLsizei)path.sizes.size()));
1364#if ENABLE_GCODE_VIEWER_STATISTICS
1365 ++m_statistics.gl_multi_triangles_calls_count;
1366#endif // ENABLE_GCODE_VIEWER_STATISTICS
1367 }
1368 };
1369
1370 auto render_as_instanced_model = [
1371#if ENABLE_GCODE_VIEWER_STATISTICS
1372 this
1373#endif // ENABLE_GCODE_VIEWER_STATISTICS
1374 ](TBuffer& buffer, GLShaderProgram& shader) {
1375 for (auto& range : buffer.model.instances.render_ranges.ranges) {
1376 if (range.vbo == 0 && range.count > 0) {
1377 glsafe(::glGenBuffers(1, &range.vbo));
1378 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, range.vbo));
1379 glsafe(::glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, range.count * buffer.model.instances.instance_size_bytes(), (const void*)&buffer.model.instances.buffer[range.offset * buffer.model.instances.instance_size_floats()], GL_STATIC_DRAW));
1380 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0));
1381 }
1382
1383 if (range.vbo > 0) {
1384 buffer.model.model.set_color(-1, range.color);
1385 buffer.model.model.render_instanced(range.vbo, range.count);
1386#if ENABLE_GCODE_VIEWER_STATISTICS
1387 ++m_statistics.gl_instanced_models_calls_count;
1388 m_statistics.total_instances_gpu_size += static_cast<int64_t>(range.count * buffer.model.instances.instance_size_bytes());
1389#endif // ENABLE_GCODE_VIEWER_STATISTICS
1390 }
1391 }
1392 };
1393
1394#if ENABLE_GCODE_VIEWER_STATISTICS
1395 auto render_as_batched_model = [this](TBuffer& buffer, GLShaderProgram& shader) {
1396#else
1397 auto render_as_batched_model = [](TBuffer& buffer, GLShaderProgram& shader) {
1398#endif // ENABLE_GCODE_VIEWER_STATISTICS
1399
1400 struct Range
1401 {
1402 unsigned int first;
1403 unsigned int last;
1404 bool intersects(const Range& other) const { return (other.last < first || other.first > last) ? false : true; }
1405 };
1406 Range buffer_range = { 0, 0 };
1407 size_t indices_per_instance = buffer.model.data.indices_count();
1408
1409 for (size_t j = 0; j < buffer.indices.size(); ++j) {
1410 const IBuffer& i_buffer = buffer.indices[j];
1411 buffer_range.last = buffer_range.first + i_buffer.count / indices_per_instance;
1412 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, i_buffer.vbo));
1413 glsafe(::glVertexPointer(buffer.vertices.position_size_floats(), GL_FLOAT, buffer.vertices.vertex_size_bytes(), (const void*)buffer.vertices.position_offset_bytes()));
1414 glsafe(::glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY));
1415 bool has_normals = buffer.vertices.normal_size_floats() > 0;
1416 if (has_normals) {
1417 glsafe(::glNormalPointer(GL_FLOAT, buffer.vertices.vertex_size_bytes(), (const void*)buffer.vertices.normal_offset_bytes()));
1418 glsafe(::glEnableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY));
1419 }
1420
1421 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, i_buffer.ibo));
1422
1423 for (auto& range : buffer.model.instances.render_ranges.ranges) {
1424 Range range_range = { range.offset, range.offset + range.count };
1425 if (range_range.intersects(buffer_range)) {
1426 shader.set_uniform("uniform_color", range.color);
1427 unsigned int offset = (range_range.first > buffer_range.first) ? range_range.first - buffer_range.first : 0;
1428 size_t offset_bytes = static_cast<size_t>(offset) * indices_per_instance * sizeof(IBufferType);
1429 Range render_range = { std::max(range_range.first, buffer_range.first), std::min(range_range.last, buffer_range.last) };
1430 size_t count = static_cast<size_t>(render_range.last - render_range.first) * indices_per_instance;
1431 if (count > 0) {
1432 glsafe(::glDrawElements(GL_TRIANGLES, (GLsizei)count, GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT, (const void*)offset_bytes));
1433#if ENABLE_GCODE_VIEWER_STATISTICS
1434 ++m_statistics.gl_batched_models_calls_count;
1435#endif // ENABLE_GCODE_VIEWER_STATISTICS
1436 }
1437 }
1438 }
1439
1440 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0));
1441
1442 if (has_normals)
1443 glsafe(::glDisableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY));
1444
1445 glsafe(::glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY));
1446 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0));
1447
1448 buffer_range.first = buffer_range.last;
1449 }
1450 };
1451
1452 unsigned char begin_id = buffer_id(EMoveType::Retract);
1453 unsigned char end_id = buffer_id(EMoveType::Count);
1454
1455 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) << boost::format("render_calibration_thumbnail: begin_id %1%, end_id %2%")%begin_id %end_id;
1456 for (unsigned char i = begin_id; i < end_id; ++i) {
1457 TBuffer& buffer = m_buffers[i];
1458 if (!buffer.visible || !buffer.has_data())
1459 continue;
1460
1461 GLShaderProgram* shader = opengl_manager.get_shader("cali");
1462 if (shader != nullptr) {
1463 shader->start_using();
1464
1465 if (buffer.render_primitive_type == TBuffer::ERenderPrimitiveType::InstancedModel) {
1466 //shader->set_uniform("emission_factor", 0.25f);
1467 render_as_instanced_model(buffer, *shader);
1468 //shader->set_uniform("emission_factor", 0.0f);
1469 }
1470 else if (buffer.render_primitive_type == TBuffer::ERenderPrimitiveType::BatchedModel) {
1471 //shader->set_uniform("emission_factor", 0.25f);
1472 render_as_batched_model(buffer, *shader);
1473 //shader->set_uniform("emission_factor", 0.0f);
1474 }
1475 else {
1476 switch (buffer.render_primitive_type) {
1477 default: break;
1478 }
1479 int uniform_color = shader->get_uniform_location("uniform_color");
1480 auto it_path = buffer.render_paths.begin();
1481 for (unsigned int ibuffer_id = 0; ibuffer_id < static_cast<unsigned int>(buffer.indices.size()); ++ibuffer_id) {
1482 const IBuffer& i_buffer = buffer.indices[ibuffer_id];
1483 // Skip all paths with ibuffer_id < ibuffer_id.
1484 for (; it_path != buffer.render_paths.end() && it_path->ibuffer_id < ibuffer_id; ++it_path);
1485 if (it_path == buffer.render_paths.end() || it_path->ibuffer_id > ibuffer_id)
1486 // Not found. This shall not happen.
1487 continue;
1488
1489 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, i_buffer.vbo));
1490 glsafe(::glVertexPointer(buffer.vertices.position_size_floats(), GL_FLOAT, buffer.vertices.vertex_size_bytes(), (const void*)buffer.vertices.position_offset_bytes()));
1491 glsafe(::glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY));
1492 bool has_normals = false;// buffer.vertices.normal_size_floats() > 0;
1493 if (has_normals) {
1494 glsafe(::glNormalPointer(GL_FLOAT, buffer.vertices.vertex_size_bytes(), (const void*)buffer.vertices.normal_offset_bytes()));
1495 glsafe(::glEnableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY));
1496 }
1497
1498 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, i_buffer.ibo));
1499
1500 // Render all elements with it_path->ibuffer_id == ibuffer_id, possible with varying colors.
1501 switch (buffer.render_primitive_type)
1502 {
1503 case TBuffer::ERenderPrimitiveType::Triangle: {
1504 render_as_triangles(buffer, it_path, buffer.render_paths.end(), *shader, uniform_color);
1505 break;
1506 }
1507 default: { break; }
1508 }
1509
1510 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0));
1511
1512 if (has_normals)
1513 glsafe(::glDisableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY));
1514
1515 glsafe(::glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY));
1516 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0));
1517 }
1518 }
1519
1520 shader->stop_using();
1521 }
1522 else {
1523 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) << boost::format("render_calibration_thumbnail: can not find shader");
1524 }
1525 }
1526#endif
1527 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) << boost::format("render_calibration_thumbnail: exit");
1528
1529}
count
static unsigned int count

◆ export_toolpaths_to_obj()

void Slic3r::GUI::GCodeViewer::export_toolpaths_to_obj ( const char *  filename) const
1883{
1884 if (filename == nullptr)
1885 return;
1886
1887 if (!has_data())
1888 return;
1889
1890 wxBusyCursor busy;
1891
1892 // the data needed is contained into the Extrude TBuffer
1893 const TBuffer& t_buffer = m_buffers[buffer_id(EMoveType::Extrude)];
1894 if (!t_buffer.has_data())
1895 return;
1896
1897 if (t_buffer.render_primitive_type != TBuffer::ERenderPrimitiveType::Triangle)
1898 return;
1899
1900 // collect color information to generate materials
1901 std::vector<Color> colors;
1902 for (const RenderPath& path : t_buffer.render_paths) {
1903 colors.push_back(path.color);
1904 }
1905 sort_remove_duplicates(colors);
1906
1907 // save materials file
1908 boost::filesystem::path mat_filename(filename);
1909 mat_filename.replace_extension("mtl");
1910
1911 CNumericLocalesSetter locales_setter;
1912
1913 FILE* fp = boost::nowide::fopen(mat_filename.string().c_str(), "w");
1914 if (fp == nullptr) {
1915 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(error) << "GCodeViewer::export_toolpaths_to_obj: Couldn't open " << mat_filename.string().c_str() << " for writing";
1916 return;
1917 }
1918
1919 fprintf(fp, "# G-Code Toolpaths Materials\n");
1920 fprintf(fp, "# Generated by %s-%s based on Slic3r\n", SLIC3R_APP_NAME, SoftFever_VERSION);
1921
1922 unsigned int colors_count = 1;
1923 for (const Color& color : colors) {
1924 fprintf(fp, "\nnewmtl material_%d\n", colors_count++);
1925 fprintf(fp, "Ka 1 1 1\n");
1926 fprintf(fp, "Kd %g %g %g\n", color[0], color[1], color[2]);
1927 fprintf(fp, "Ks 0 0 0\n");
1928 }
1929
1930 fclose(fp);
1931
1932 // save geometry file
1933 fp = boost::nowide::fopen(filename, "w");
1934 if (fp == nullptr) {
1935 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(error) << "GCodeViewer::export_toolpaths_to_obj: Couldn't open " << filename << " for writing";
1936 return;
1937 }
1938
1939 fprintf(fp, "# G-Code Toolpaths\n");
1940 fprintf(fp, "# Generated by %s-%s based on Slic3r\n", SLIC3R_APP_NAME, SoftFever_VERSION);
1941 fprintf(fp, "\nmtllib ./%s\n", mat_filename.filename().string().c_str());
1942
1943 const size_t floats_per_vertex = t_buffer.vertices.vertex_size_floats();
1944
1945 std::vector<Vec3f> out_vertices;
1946 std::vector<Vec3f> out_normals;
1947
1948 struct VerticesOffset
1949 {
1950 unsigned int vbo;
1951 size_t offset;
1952 };
1953 std::vector<VerticesOffset> vertices_offsets;
1954 vertices_offsets.push_back({ t_buffer.vertices.vbos.front(), 0 });
1955
1956 // get vertices/normals data from vertex buffers on gpu
1957 for (size_t i = 0; i < t_buffer.vertices.vbos.size(); ++i) {
1958 const size_t floats_count = t_buffer.vertices.sizes[i] / sizeof(float);
1959 VertexBuffer vertices(floats_count);
1960 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, t_buffer.vertices.vbos[i]));
1961 glsafe(::glGetBufferSubData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0, static_cast<GLsizeiptr>(t_buffer.vertices.sizes[i]), static_cast<void*>(vertices.data())));
1962 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0));
1963 const size_t vertices_count = floats_count / floats_per_vertex;
1964 for (size_t j = 0; j < vertices_count; ++j) {
1965 const size_t base = j * floats_per_vertex;
1966 out_vertices.push_back({ vertices[base + 0], vertices[base + 1], vertices[base + 2] });
1967 out_normals.push_back({ vertices[base + 3], vertices[base + 4], vertices[base + 5] });
1968 }
1969
1970 if (i < t_buffer.vertices.vbos.size() - 1)
1971 vertices_offsets.push_back({ t_buffer.vertices.vbos[i + 1], vertices_offsets.back().offset + vertices_count });
1972 }
1973
1974 // save vertices to file
1975 fprintf(fp, "\n# vertices\n");
1976 for (const Vec3f& v : out_vertices) {
1977 fprintf(fp, "v %g %g %g\n", v.x(), v.y(), v.z());
1978 }
1979
1980 // save normals to file
1981 fprintf(fp, "\n# normals\n");
1982 for (const Vec3f& n : out_normals) {
1983 fprintf(fp, "vn %g %g %g\n", n.x(), n.y(), n.z());
1984 }
1985
1986 size_t i = 0;
1987 for (const Color& color : colors) {
1988 // save material triangles to file
1989 fprintf(fp, "\nusemtl material_%zu\n", i + 1);
1990 fprintf(fp, "# triangles material %zu\n", i + 1);
1991
1992 for (const RenderPath& render_path : t_buffer.render_paths) {
1993 if (render_path.color != color)
1994 continue;
1995
1996 const IBuffer& ibuffer = t_buffer.indices[render_path.ibuffer_id];
1997 size_t vertices_offset = 0;
1998 for (size_t j = 0; j < vertices_offsets.size(); ++j) {
1999 const VerticesOffset& offset = vertices_offsets[j];
2000 if (offset.vbo == ibuffer.vbo) {
2001 vertices_offset = offset.offset;
2002 break;
2003 }
2004 }
2005
2006 // get indices data from index buffer on gpu
2007 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, ibuffer.ibo));
2008 for (size_t j = 0; j < render_path.sizes.size(); ++j) {
2009 IndexBuffer indices(render_path.sizes[j]);
2010 glsafe(::glGetBufferSubData(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, static_cast<GLintptr>(render_path.offsets[j]),
2011 static_cast<GLsizeiptr>(render_path.sizes[j] * sizeof(IBufferType)), static_cast<void*>(indices.data())));
2012
2013 const size_t triangles_count = render_path.sizes[j] / 3;
2014 for (size_t k = 0; k < triangles_count; ++k) {
2015 const size_t base = k * 3;
2016 const size_t v1 = 1 + static_cast<size_t>(indices[base + 0]) + vertices_offset;
2017 const size_t v2 = 1 + static_cast<size_t>(indices[base + 1]) + vertices_offset;
2018 const size_t v3 = 1 + static_cast<size_t>(indices[base + 2]) + vertices_offset;
2019 if (v1 != v2)
2020 // do not export dummy triangles
2021 fprintf(fp, "f %zu//%zu %zu//%zu %zu//%zu\n", v1, v1, v2, v2, v3, v3);
2022 }
2023 }
2024 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0));
2025 }
2026 ++i;
2027 }
2028
2029 fclose(fp);
2030}

Slic3r::GUI::GCodeViewer::m_extruders_count

◆ get_options_visibility_flags()

unsigned int Slic3r::GUI::GCodeViewer::get_options_visibility_flags ( ) const
1832{
1833 auto set_flag = [](unsigned int flags, unsigned int flag, bool active) {
1834 return active ? (flags | (1 << flag)) : flags;
1835 };
1836
1837 unsigned int flags = 0;
1838 flags = set_flag(flags, static_cast<unsigned int>(Preview::OptionType::Travel), is_toolpath_move_type_visible(EMoveType::Travel));
1839 flags = set_flag(flags, static_cast<unsigned int>(Preview::OptionType::Wipe), is_toolpath_move_type_visible(EMoveType::Wipe));
1840 flags = set_flag(flags, static_cast<unsigned int>(Preview::OptionType::Retractions), is_toolpath_move_type_visible(EMoveType::Retract));
1841 flags = set_flag(flags, static_cast<unsigned int>(Preview::OptionType::Unretractions), is_toolpath_move_type_visible(EMoveType::Unretract));
1842 flags = set_flag(flags, static_cast<unsigned int>(Preview::OptionType::Seams), is_toolpath_move_type_visible(EMoveType::Seam));
1843 flags = set_flag(flags, static_cast<unsigned int>(Preview::OptionType::ToolChanges), is_toolpath_move_type_visible(EMoveType::Tool_change));
1844 flags = set_flag(flags, static_cast<unsigned int>(Preview::OptionType::ColorChanges), is_toolpath_move_type_visible(EMoveType::Color_change));
1845 flags = set_flag(flags, static_cast<unsigned int>(Preview::OptionType::PausePrints), is_toolpath_move_type_visible(EMoveType::Pause_Print));
1846 flags = set_flag(flags, static_cast<unsigned int>(Preview::OptionType::CustomGCodes), is_toolpath_move_type_visible(EMoveType::Custom_GCode));
1847 flags = set_flag(flags, static_cast<unsigned int>(Preview::OptionType::Shells), m_shells.visible);
1848 flags = set_flag(flags, static_cast<unsigned int>(Preview::OptionType::ToolMarker), m_sequential_view.marker.is_visible());
1849 flags = set_flag(flags, static_cast<unsigned int>(Preview::OptionType::Legend), is_legend_enabled());
1850 return flags;
1851}

◆ init()

void Slic3r::GUI::GCodeViewer::init ( ConfigOptionMode  mode,
Slic3r::PresetBundle *  preset_bundle 
)
807{
808 if (m_gl_data_initialized)
809 return;
810
811 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) << __FUNCTION__ << boost::format(": enter, m_buffers.size=%1%")
812 %m_buffers.size();
813 // initializes opengl data of TBuffers
814 for (size_t i = 0; i < m_buffers.size(); ++i) {
815 TBuffer& buffer = m_buffers[i];
816 EMoveType type = buffer_type(i);
817 switch (type)
818 {
819 default: { break; }
820 case EMoveType::Tool_change:
821 case EMoveType::Color_change:
822 case EMoveType::Pause_Print:
823 case EMoveType::Custom_GCode:
824 case EMoveType::Retract:
825 case EMoveType::Unretract:
826 case EMoveType::Seam: {
827// if (wxGetApp().is_gl_version_greater_or_equal_to(3, 3)) {
828// buffer.render_primitive_type = TBuffer::ERenderPrimitiveType::InstancedModel;
829// buffer.shader = "gouraud_light_instanced";
830// buffer.model.model.init_from(diamond(16));
831// buffer.model.color = option_color(type);
832// buffer.model.instances.format = InstanceVBuffer::EFormat::InstancedModel;
833// }
834// else {
835 if(type == EMoveType::Seam)
836 buffer.visible = true;
837
838 buffer.render_primitive_type = TBuffer::ERenderPrimitiveType::BatchedModel;
839 buffer.vertices.format = VBuffer::EFormat::PositionNormal3;
840 buffer.shader = "gouraud_light";
841
842 buffer.model.data = diamond(16);
843 buffer.model.color = option_color(type);
844 buffer.model.instances.format = InstanceVBuffer::EFormat::BatchedModel;
845// }
846 break;
847 }
848 case EMoveType::Wipe:
849 case EMoveType::Extrude: {
850 buffer.render_primitive_type = TBuffer::ERenderPrimitiveType::Triangle;
851 buffer.vertices.format = VBuffer::EFormat::PositionNormal3;
852 buffer.shader = "gouraud_light";
853 break;
854 }
855 case EMoveType::Travel: {
856 buffer.render_primitive_type = TBuffer::ERenderPrimitiveType::Line;
857 buffer.vertices.format = VBuffer::EFormat::PositionNormal3;
858 buffer.shader = "toolpaths_lines";
859 break;
860 }
861 }
862
863 set_toolpath_move_type_visible(EMoveType::Extrude, true);
864 }
865
866 // initializes tool marker
867 std::string filename;
868 if (preset_bundle != nullptr) {
869 const Preset* curr = &preset_bundle->printers.get_selected_preset();
870 if (curr->is_system)
871 filename = PresetUtils::system_printer_hotend_model(*curr);
872 else {
873 auto *printer_model = curr->config.opt<ConfigOptionString>("printer_model");
874 if (printer_model != nullptr && ! printer_model->value.empty()) {
875 filename = preset_bundle->get_hotend_model_for_printer_model(printer_model->value);
876 }
877
878 if (filename.empty()) {
879 filename = preset_bundle->get_hotend_model_for_printer_model(PresetBundle::BBL_DEFAULT_PRINTER_MODEL);
880 }
881 }
882 }
883
884 m_sequential_view.marker.init(filename);
885
886 // initializes point sizes
887 std::array<int, 2> point_sizes;
888 ::glGetIntegerv(GL_ALIASED_POINT_SIZE_RANGE, point_sizes.data());
889 m_detected_point_sizes = { static_cast<float>(point_sizes[0]), static_cast<float>(point_sizes[1]) };
890
891 // BBS initialzed view_type items
892 m_user_mode = mode;
893 update_by_mode(m_user_mode);
894
895 m_layers_slider->init_texture();
896
897 m_gl_data_initialized = true;
898 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) << __FUNCTION__ << boost::format(": finished");
899}

void init(std::string filename)

1819{
1820 size_t id = static_cast<size_t>(buffer_id(type));

◆ load()

void Slic3r::GUI::GCodeViewer::load ( const GCodeProcessorResult &  gcode_result,
const Print &  print,
const BuildVolume &  build_volume,
const std::vector< BoundingBoxf3 > &  exclude_bounding_box,
bool  initialized,
ConfigOptionMode  mode,
bool  only_gcode = false 
)
963{
964 // avoid processing if called with the same gcode_result
965 if (m_last_result_id == gcode_result.id) {
966 //BBS: add logs
967 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) << __FUNCTION__ << boost::format(": the same id %1%, return directly, result %2% ") % m_last_result_id % (&gcode_result);
968 return;
969 }
970
971 //BBS: add logs
972 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) << __FUNCTION__ << boost::format(": gcode result %1%, new id %2%, gcode file %3% ") % (&gcode_result) % m_last_result_id % gcode_result.filename;
973
974 // release gpu memory, if used
975 reset();
976
977 //BBS: add mutex for protection of gcode result
978 gcode_result.lock();
979 //BBS: add safe check
980 if (gcode_result.moves.size() == 0) {
981 //result cleaned before slicing ,should return here
982 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(warning) << __FUNCTION__ << boost::format(": gcode result reset before, return directly!");
983 gcode_result.unlock();
984 return;
985 }
986
987 //BBS: move the id to the end of reset
988 m_last_result_id = gcode_result.id;
989 m_gcode_result = &gcode_result;
990 m_only_gcode_in_preview = only_gcode;
991
992 m_sequential_view.gcode_window.load_gcode(gcode_result.filename,
993 // Stealing out lines_ends should be safe because this gcode_result is
994 // processed only once (see the 1st if in this function).
995 std::move(const_cast<std::vector<size_t> &>(gcode_result.lines_ends)));
996
997 //BBS: add only gcode mode
998 //if (wxGetApp().is_gcode_viewer())
999 if (m_only_gcode_in_preview)
1000 m_custom_gcode_per_print_z = gcode_result.custom_gcode_per_print_z;
1001
1002 m_max_print_height = gcode_result.printable_height;
1003
1004 load_toolpaths(gcode_result, build_volume, exclude_bounding_box);
1005
1006 //BBS: add mutex for protection of gcode result
1007 if (m_layers.empty()) {
1008 gcode_result.unlock();
1009 return;
1010 }
1011
1012 m_settings_ids = gcode_result.settings_ids;
1013 m_filament_diameters = gcode_result.filament_diameters;
1014 m_filament_densities = gcode_result.filament_densities;
1015 m_sequential_view.m_show_gcode_window = false;

1020 //load_shells(print, initialized);

1022 else {*/

1026 //BBS: add bed exclude area
1027 Pointfs bed_exclude_area = Pointfs();
1028 std::string texture;
1029 std::string model;
1030

1032 // bed shape detected in the gcode
1033 printable_area = gcode_result.printable_area;
1034 const auto bundle = wxGetApp().preset_bundle;
1035 if (bundle != nullptr && !m_settings_ids.printer.empty()) {
1036 const Preset* preset = bundle->printers.find_preset(m_settings_ids.printer);
1037 if (preset != nullptr) {
1038 model = PresetUtils::system_printer_bed_model(*preset);
1039 texture = PresetUtils::system_printer_bed_texture(*preset);
1040 }
1041 }
1042

1045 bed_exclude_area = gcode_result.bed_exclude_area;
1046

1077 short_time(get_time_dhms(time)) == short_time(get_time_dhms(m_print_statistics.modes[static_cast<size_t>(PrintEstimatedStatistics::ETimeMode::Normal)].time)))
1078 m_time_estimate_mode = PrintEstimatedStatistics::ETimeMode::Normal;
1079 }

1084 if (view_type_items[i] == EViewType::ColorPrint) {
1085 m_view_type_sel = i;
1086 break;
1087 }
1088 }
1089
1090 set_view_type(EViewType::ColorPrint);
1091 }
1092
1093 m_fold = false;
1094
1095 bool only_gcode_3mf = false;
1096 PartPlate* current_plate = wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list().get_curr_plate();
1097 bool current_has_print_instances = current_plate->has_printable_instances();

1100 m_layers_slider->set_menu_enable(!(only_gcode || only_gcode_3mf));
1101 m_layers_slider->set_as_dirty();
1102 m_moves_slider->set_as_dirty();
1103

1111 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) << __FUNCTION__ << boost::format(": finished, m_buffers size %1%!")%m_buffers.size();
