3891 auto render_as_instanced_model = [
3892#if ENABLE_GCODE_VIEWER_STATISTICS
3893 this
3894#endif // ENABLE_GCODE_VIEWER_STATISTICS
3895 ](TBuffer& buffer, GLShaderProgram & shader) {
3896 for (auto& range : buffer.model.instances.render_ranges.ranges) {
3897 if (range.vbo == 0 && range.count > 0) {
3898 glsafe(::glGenBuffers(1, &range.vbo));
3899 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, range.vbo));
3900 glsafe(::glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, range.count * buffer.model.instances.instance_size_bytes(), (const void*)&buffer.model.instances.buffer[range.offset * buffer.model.instances.instance_size_floats()], GL_STATIC_DRAW));
3901 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0));
3902 }
3903
3904 if (range.vbo > 0) {
3905 buffer.model.model.set_color(-1, range.color);
3906 buffer.model.model.render_instanced(range.vbo, range.count);
3907#if ENABLE_GCODE_VIEWER_STATISTICS
3908 ++m_statistics.gl_instanced_models_calls_count;
3909 m_statistics.total_instances_gpu_size += static_cast<int64_t>(range.count * buffer.model.instances.instance_size_bytes());
3910#endif // ENABLE_GCODE_VIEWER_STATISTICS
3911 }
3912 }
3913 };
3914
3915#if ENABLE_GCODE_VIEWER_STATISTICS
3916 auto render_as_batched_model = [this](TBuffer& buffer, GLShaderProgram& shader) {
3917#else
3918 auto render_as_batched_model = [](TBuffer& buffer, GLShaderProgram& shader) {
3919#endif // ENABLE_GCODE_VIEWER_STATISTICS
3920
3921 struct Range
3922 {
3923 unsigned int first;
3924 unsigned int last;
3925 bool intersects(const Range& other) const { return (other.last < first || other.first > last) ? false : true; }
3926 };
3927 Range buffer_range = { 0, 0 };
3928 size_t indices_per_instance = buffer.model.data.indices_count();
3929
3930 for (size_t j = 0; j < buffer.indices.size(); ++j) {
3931 const IBuffer& i_buffer = buffer.indices[j];
3932 buffer_range.last = buffer_range.first + i_buffer.count / indices_per_instance;
3933 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, i_buffer.vbo));
3934 glsafe(::glVertexPointer(buffer.vertices.position_size_floats(), GL_FLOAT, buffer.vertices.vertex_size_bytes(), (const void*)buffer.vertices.position_offset_bytes()));
3935 glsafe(::glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY));
3936 bool has_normals = buffer.vertices.normal_size_floats() > 0;
3937 if (has_normals) {
3938 glsafe(::glNormalPointer(GL_FLOAT, buffer.vertices.vertex_size_bytes(), (const void*)buffer.vertices.normal_offset_bytes()));
3939 glsafe(::glEnableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY));
3940 }
3941
3942 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, i_buffer.ibo));
3943
3944 for (auto& range : buffer.model.instances.render_ranges.ranges) {
3945 Range range_range = { range.offset, range.offset + range.count };
3946 if (range_range.intersects(buffer_range)) {
3947 shader.set_uniform("uniform_color", range.color);
3948 unsigned int offset = (range_range.first > buffer_range.first) ? range_range.first - buffer_range.first : 0;
3949 size_t offset_bytes = static_cast<size_t>(offset) * indices_per_instance * sizeof(IBufferType);
3950 Range render_range = { std::max(range_range.first, buffer_range.first), std::min(range_range.last, buffer_range.last) };
3951 size_t count = static_cast<size_t>(render_range.last - render_range.first) * indices_per_instance;
3952 if (count > 0) {
3953 glsafe(::glDrawElements(GL_TRIANGLES, (GLsizei)count, GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT, (const void*)offset_bytes));
3954#if ENABLE_GCODE_VIEWER_STATISTICS
3955 ++m_statistics.gl_batched_models_calls_count;
3956#endif // ENABLE_GCODE_VIEWER_STATISTICS
3957 }
3958 }
3959 }
3960
3961 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0));
3962
3963 if (has_normals)
3964 glsafe(::glDisableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY));
3965
3966 glsafe(::glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY));
3967 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0));
3968
3969 buffer_range.first = buffer_range.last;
3970 }
3971 };
3972
3973 auto line_width = [](double zoom) {
3974 return (zoom < 5.0) ? 1.0 : (1.0 + 5.0 * (zoom - 5.0) / (100.0 - 5.0));
3975 };
3976
3977 unsigned char begin_id = buffer_id(EMoveType::Retract);
3978 unsigned char end_id = buffer_id(EMoveType::Count);
3979 //BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) << __FUNCTION__ << boost::format(":begin_id %1%, end_id %2% ")%(int)begin_id %(int)end_id;
3980
3981 for (unsigned char i = begin_id; i < end_id; ++i) {
3982 TBuffer& buffer = m_buffers[i];
3983 if (!buffer.visible || !buffer.has_data())
3984 continue;
3985
3986 GLShaderProgram* shader = wxGetApp().get_shader(buffer.shader.c_str());
3987 if (shader != nullptr) {
3988 shader->start_using();
3989
3990 if (buffer.render_primitive_type == TBuffer::ERenderPrimitiveType::InstancedModel) {
3991 shader->set_uniform("emission_factor", 0.25f);
3992 render_as_instanced_model(buffer, *shader);
3993 shader->set_uniform("emission_factor", 0.0f);
3994 }
3995 else if (buffer.render_primitive_type == TBuffer::ERenderPrimitiveType::BatchedModel) {
3996 shader->set_uniform("emission_factor", 0.25f);
3997 render_as_batched_model(buffer, *shader);
3998 shader->set_uniform("emission_factor", 0.0f);
3999 }
4000 else {
4001 switch (buffer.render_primitive_type) {
4002 case TBuffer::ERenderPrimitiveType::Point: shader_init_as_points(*shader); break;
4003 case TBuffer::ERenderPrimitiveType::Line: shader_init_as_lines(*shader); break;
4004 default: break;
4005 }
4006 int uniform_color = shader->get_uniform_location("uniform_color");
4007 auto it_path = buffer.render_paths.begin();
4008 //BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) << __FUNCTION__ << boost::format(":buffer indices size %1%, render_path size %2% ")%buffer.indices.size() %buffer.render_paths.size();
4009 for (unsigned int ibuffer_id = 0; ibuffer_id < static_cast<unsigned int>(buffer.indices.size()); ++ibuffer_id) {
4010 const IBuffer& i_buffer = buffer.indices[ibuffer_id];
4011 // Skip all paths with ibuffer_id < ibuffer_id.
4012 for (; it_path != buffer.render_paths.end() && it_path->ibuffer_id < ibuffer_id; ++ it_path) ;
4013 if (it_path == buffer.render_paths.end() || it_path->ibuffer_id > ibuffer_id)
4014 // Not found. This shall not happen.
4015 continue;
4016
4017 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, i_buffer.vbo));
4018 glsafe(::glVertexPointer(buffer.vertices.position_size_floats(), GL_FLOAT, buffer.vertices.vertex_size_bytes(), (const void*)buffer.vertices.position_offset_bytes()));
4019 glsafe(::glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY));
4020 bool has_normals = buffer.vertices.normal_size_floats() > 0;
4021 if (has_normals) {
4022 glsafe(::glNormalPointer(GL_FLOAT, buffer.vertices.vertex_size_bytes(), (const void*)buffer.vertices.normal_offset_bytes()));
4023 glsafe(::glEnableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY));
4024 }
4025
4026 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, i_buffer.ibo));
4027
4028 // Render all elements with it_path->ibuffer_id == ibuffer_id, possible with varying colors.
4029 switch (buffer.render_primitive_type)
4030 {
4031 case TBuffer::ERenderPrimitiveType::Point: {
4032 render_as_points(it_path, buffer.render_paths.end(), *shader, uniform_color);
4033 break;
4034 }
4035 case TBuffer::ERenderPrimitiveType::Line: {
4036 glsafe(::glLineWidth(static_cast<GLfloat>(line_width(zoom))));
4037 render_as_lines(it_path, buffer.render_paths.end(), *shader, uniform_color);
4038 break;
4039 }
4040 case TBuffer::ERenderPrimitiveType::Triangle: {
4041 render_as_triangles(it_path, buffer.render_paths.end(), *shader, uniform_color);
4042 break;
4043 }
4044 default: { break; }
4045 }
4046
4047 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0));
4048
4049 if (has_normals)
4050 glsafe(::glDisableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY));
4051
4052 glsafe(::glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY));
4053 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0));
4054 }
4055 }
4056
4057 shader->stop_using();
4058 }
4059 }
4060
4061#if ENABLE_GCODE_VIEWER_STATISTICS
4062 auto render_sequential_range_cap = [this]
4063#else
4064 auto render_sequential_range_cap = []
4065#endif // ENABLE_GCODE_VIEWER_STATISTICS
4066 (const SequentialRangeCap& cap) {
4067 GLShaderProgram* shader = wxGetApp().get_shader(cap.buffer->shader.c_str());
4068 if (shader != nullptr) {
4069 shader->start_using();
4070
4071 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, cap.vbo));
4072 glsafe(::glVertexPointer(cap.buffer->vertices.position_size_floats(), GL_FLOAT, cap.buffer->vertices.vertex_size_bytes(), (const void*)cap.buffer->vertices.position_offset_bytes()));
4073 glsafe(::glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY));
4074 bool has_normals = cap.buffer->vertices.normal_size_floats() > 0;
4075 if (has_normals) {
4076 glsafe(::glNormalPointer(GL_FLOAT, cap.buffer->vertices.vertex_size_bytes(), (const void*)cap.buffer->vertices.normal_offset_bytes()));
4077 glsafe(::glEnableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY));
4078 }
4079
4080 shader->set_uniform("uniform_color", cap.color);
4081
4082 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, cap.ibo));
4083 glsafe(::glDrawElements(GL_TRIANGLES, (GLsizei)cap.indices_count(), GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT, nullptr));
4084 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0));
4085
4086#if ENABLE_GCODE_VIEWER_STATISTICS
4087 ++m_statistics.gl_triangles_calls_count;
4088#endif // ENABLE_GCODE_VIEWER_STATISTICS
4089
4090 if (has_normals)
4091 glsafe(::glDisableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY));
4092
4093 glsafe(::glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY));
4094 glsafe(::glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0));
4095
4096 shader->stop_using();
4097 }
4098 };
4099
4100 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < 2; ++i) {
4101 if (m_sequential_range_caps[i].is_renderable())
4102 render_sequential_range_cap(m_sequential_range_caps[i]);
4103 }
4104}

constexpr T deg2rad(const T angle)
Definition Geometry.hpp:295

◆ update_layers_slider_mode()

void Slic3r::GUI::GCodeViewer::update_layers_slider_mode ( )
1765{
1766 // true -> single-extruder printer profile OR
1767 // multi-extruder printer profile , but whole model is printed by only one extruder
1768 // false -> multi-extruder printer profile , and model is printed by several extruders
1769 bool one_extruder_printed_model = true;
1770
1771 // extruder used for whole model for multi-extruder printer profile
1772 int only_extruder = -1;
1773
1774 // BBS
1775 if (wxGetApp().filaments_cnt() > 1) {
1776 const ModelObjectPtrs &objects = wxGetApp().plater()->model().objects;
1777
1778 // check if whole model uses just only one extruder
1779 if (!objects.empty()) {
1780 const int extruder = objects[0]->config.has("extruder") ? objects[0]->config.option("extruder")->getInt() : 0;
1781
1782 auto is_one_extruder_printed_model = [objects, extruder]() {
1783 for (ModelObject *object : objects) {
1784 if (object->config.has("extruder") && object->config.option("extruder")->getInt() != extruder) return false;
1785
1786 for (ModelVolume *volume : object->volumes)
1787 if ((volume->config.has("extruder") && volume->config.option("extruder")->getInt() != extruder) || !volume->mmu_segmentation_facets.empty()) return false;
1788
1789 for (const auto &range : object->layer_config_ranges)
1790 if (range.second.has("extruder") && range.second.option("extruder")->getInt() != extruder) return false;
1791 }
1792 return true;
1793 };
1794
1795 if (is_one_extruder_printed_model())
1796 only_extruder = extruder;
1797 else
1798 one_extruder_printed_model = false;
1799 }
1800 }
1801
1802 // TODO m_layers_slider->SetModeAndOnlyExtruder(one_extruder_printed_model, only_extruder);
1803}
nlohmann::detail::value_t::object
@ object
object (unordered set of name/value pairs)
return
for(;HAS_CHAR(enc, ptr, end);ptr+=MINBPC(enc)) return
Definition xmltok_impl.inc:1372

References Slic3r::range().

◆ update_marker_curr_move()

void Slic3r::GUI::GCodeViewer::update_marker_curr_move ( )
1805 {
1806 if ((int)m_last_result_id != -1) {
1807 auto it = std::find_if(m_gcode_result->moves.begin(), m_gcode_result->moves.end(), [this](auto move) {
1808 if (m_sequential_view.current.last < m_sequential_view.gcode_ids.size() && m_sequential_view.current.last >= 0) {
1809 return move.gcode_id == static_cast<uint64_t>(m_sequential_view.gcode_ids[m_sequential_view.current.last]);
1810 }
1811 return false;
1812 });
1813 if (it != m_gcode_result->moves.end())
1814 m_sequential_view.marker.update_curr_move(*it);
1815 }
1816}

void update_curr_move(const GCodeProcessorResult::MoveVertex move)

Here is the caller graph for this function:

◆ update_moves_slider()

void Slic3r::GUI::GCodeViewer::update_moves_slider ( bool  set_to_max = false)
1742{
1743 const GCodeViewer::SequentialView &view = get_sequential_view();
1744 // this should not be needed, but it is here to try to prevent rambling crashes on Mac Asan
1745 if (view.endpoints.last < view.endpoints.first) return;
1746
1747 std::vector<double> values(view.endpoints.last - view.endpoints.first + 1);
1748 std::vector<double> alternate_values(view.endpoints.last - view.endpoints.first + 1);
1749 unsigned int count = 0;
1750 for (unsigned int i = view.endpoints.first; i <= view.endpoints.last; ++i) {
1751 values[count] = static_cast<double>(i + 1);
1752 if (view.gcode_ids[i] > 0) alternate_values[count] = static_cast<double>(view.gcode_ids[i]);
1753 ++count;
1754 }
1755
1756 m_moves_slider->SetSliderValues(values);
1757 m_moves_slider->SetSliderAlternateValues(alternate_values);
1758 m_moves_slider->SetMaxValue(view.endpoints.last - view.endpoints.first);
1759 m_moves_slider->SetSelectionSpan(view.current.first - view.endpoints.first, view.current.last - view.endpoints.first);
1760 if (set_to_max)
1761 m_moves_slider->SetHigherValue(m_moves_slider->GetMaxValue());

◆ update_sequential_view_current()

void Slic3r::GUI::GCodeViewer::update_sequential_view_current ( unsigned int  first,
unsigned int  last 
)
1687{
1688 auto is_visible = [this](unsigned int id) {
1689 for (const TBuffer &buffer : m_buffers) {
1690 if (buffer.visible) {
1691 for (const Path &path : buffer.paths) {
1692 if (path.sub_paths.front().first.s_id <= id && id <= path.sub_paths.back().last.s_id) return true;
1693 }
1694 }
1695 }
1696 return false;
1697 };
1698
1699 const int first_diff = static_cast<int>(first) - static_cast<int>(m_sequential_view.last_current.first);
1700 const int last_diff = static_cast<int>(last) - static_cast<int>(m_sequential_view.last_current.last);
1701
1702 unsigned int new_first = first;
1703 unsigned int new_last = last;
1704
1705 if (m_sequential_view.skip_invisible_moves) {
1706 while (!is_visible(new_first)) {
1707 if (first_diff > 0)
1708 ++new_first;
1709 else
1710 --new_first;
1711 }
1712
1713 while (!is_visible(new_last)) {
1714 if (last_diff > 0)
1715 ++new_last;
1716 else
1717 --new_last;
1718 }
1719 }
1720
1721 m_sequential_view.current.first = new_first;
1722 m_sequential_view.current.last = new_last;
1723 m_sequential_view.last_current = m_sequential_view.current;
1724
1725 refresh_render_paths(true, true);
1726
1727 if (new_first != first || new_last != last) {
1728 update_moves_slider();
1729 }
1730}
